title: Rebuild EVRON website with new logo, remove Industrial Battery, add Telecom Battery and split Inverter products

requirements.text: Design and generate a new EVRON logo featuring two symmetrical green leaves (#2ecc71) that form a subtle 'V' shape representing growth and energy, using a bold modern sans-serif font, with a minimal eco-friendly corporate aesthetic

quotes: Design a clean and powerful logo for EVRON using two symmetrical green leaves. The two leaves should form a subtle "V" shape representing growth and energy. Use a bold modern sans-serif font. Primary green color: #2ecc71

acceptanceCriteria: Logo displays two symmetrical green leaves in #2ecc71 color
Leaves form a subtle V shape
Uses bold modern sans-serif font for EVRON text
Design appears minimal, eco-friendly and corporate

requirements.text: Display the tagline 'Drive the Future, Live the Green' clearly visible below the EVRON logo in the hero section

quotes: Tagline clearly visible: Drive the Future, Live the Green

acceptanceCriteria: Tagline 'Drive the Future, Live the Green' appears below logo in hero section
Tagline is clearly readable and prominently displayed

requirements.text: Update About section content to describe EVRON as an innovative energy company delivering reliable lithium battery and inverter solutions for homes, telecom infrastructure, EVs and solar systems with strong professional tone

quotes: Write a strong professional paragraph describing EVRON as an innovative energy company delivering reliable lithium battery and inverter solutions for homes, telecom infrastructure, EVs and solar systems.

acceptanceCriteria: About section contains professional paragraph mentioning homes, telecom infrastructure, EVs and solar systems
Text conveys EVRON as innovative energy company
Content focuses on lithium battery and inverter solutions

requirements.text: Remove Industrial Battery Pack product card completely from the Products section
acceptanceCriteria: Industrial Battery Pack product card is no longer displayed
Products section does not reference industrial batteries

requirements.text: Add Telecom Battery product card to the Products section with professional description and premium styling
acceptanceCriteria: Telecom Battery appears as a product card in Products section
Card displays product name, description and follows existing card styling
Card includes product image with EVRON branding

requirements.text: Split the existing Lithium Inverter product into two separate product cards: 'Lithium Inverter 2KW (2000W)' and 'Lithium Inverter 3KW (3000W)'
acceptanceCriteria: Lithium Inverter 2KW (2000W) displays as separate product card
Lithium Inverter 3KW (3000W) displays as separate product card
Both cards include power ratings in title
Each card has distinct product image with EVRON branding

requirements.text: Update Why Choose EVRON section to display six benefits: 'Long Life Cycle', 'Fast Charging Technology', 'High Safety Standards', 'Energy Efficient Systems', 'Reliable Power Backup', and 'Advanced BMS Technology'

quotes:
- Long Life Cycle
- Fast Charging Technology
- High Safety Standards
- Energy Efficient Systems
- Reliable Power Backup
- Advanced BMS Technology

acceptanceCriteria: All six benefits are displayed in Why Choose EVRON section
Advanced BMS Technology is included as the sixth benefit
Each benefit displays with appropriate icon and description

requirements.text: Apply premium modern corporate design with clean spacing, energy-themed background, strong green (#2ecc71) highlights, and professional layout throughout the website

quotes: Modern corporate layout. Premium clean spacing. Energy-themed background. Strong green highlights.

acceptanceCriteria: Website displays modern corporate aesthetic
Spacing between sections is clean and premium
Background uses energy theme
Green color #2ecc71 is prominently used for highlights and accents
Layout appears professional and polished

requirements.text: Render all generated product images and brand assets (logo, product images for EV Battery, Solar Battery, Telecom Battery, Inverter 2KW, Inverter 3KW) as static files in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
acceptanceCriteria: All generated images are saved in frontend/public/assets/generated
Images are referenced as static assets in frontend components
Images do not route through backend

constraints: Do not change the backend contact form schema
Do not edit files in frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Adding new backend functionality beyond contact form
